name: ROBOTS • 20SECONDSJAM
description:
You are a bunch of incompetent robots, trying to save the day. Your robots brothers are a bit messed up and no good for the job, so take it in you robot hands (not sure you have them) and fix the reactor!

You have to activate 3 nodes around the map and after that activate the central node. You can activate them using HACKING or EMP ability. Manage your time carefully!  Every fraction of a second matters!

Controls:

— WASD to move;

— SPACE to use ability you picked up.

Game is a bit hard, but you can complete it in a bunch of ways. If there are bugs in web version, please tell about them! Offline version also available and works a bit better (there are some lighting bugs in web)

Art by Gmisscreate

Everything else by Kiberptah

Using FMOD for audio and Unity is a game engine.
